title: Scool Project monogram
content:
Hey guys,  
I´m on my 3'rd semester in school and my first monogram/logo assignment was to make a monogram/logo for myself out of two of the letters in my name.  
I chose S & K for my first and sirname.  
I would love to hear an oppinion about this... :)  
thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [monogramsk.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013093518/http:/typophile.com/files/monogramsk_0.jpg) | 724.99 KB |
author: Sun Helen

comments.content: There's something wrong with your image...

thanks, fixed now.  
Sorry this is my frst critique post so had posted it with a space in the file name at first... :p
I like it, but I think you should make the center of the S and the leg of the K more parallel.
riccard0: thanks, I see what you mean.. i'll try to make them more paralell.
